name: The Hunt for the Chocolate Egg
overview: A short Easter-themed hack. Mario wants to eat his chocolate egg, but Larry stole it! But Mario has to collect 15 eggs in order to be able to defeat Larry! Update 1.0.1: Fixed 2 pipes (one in Sky Bridge and another one in Chuck Hills) that were meant to be enterable. Fixed the status bar's coin color in Sky Bridge's bonus room. Fixed the egg counter's color in Not Yoshi's House and the intro level.
